name: Offering
desc: Something is sapping the life from your body.
miss_messages: Your will to fight fades for a moment.

name: Intense Numbness
desc: Your body feels incredibly numb and sluggish.
remove_message: The numbness fades.
//: Only Mycus Adrenaline in this case can really shake off the sluggishness.
decay_messages: The numbing effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Strengthed
desc: You feel mighty, like you could take on the world.
remove_message: The unnatural strength leaves your body.
decay_messages: The strengening effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Speedy
desc: Your heart feels like it's beating dangerously fast, you can't even think about rest.
remove_message: Your heartbeat slows back down to a normal pace.
//: Hinders relaxing, but paralysis and similar effects are too strong to prevent.
decay_messages: The quickening effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Elixir
desc: Not immortality, but it still feels nice.
remove_message: The healing effect fades.
decay_messages: The soothing effect of your potion is starting to fade.

name: Vulnerary
desc: You can feel a soothing sensation lingering after applying salve to your wounds.
remove_message: The vulnerary's after-effects fade.
decay_messages: The after-effects of the vulnerary are fading.

name: Incense
desc: Your mind feels energized, warding off fatigue.
remove_message: The incense's effect fades.
decay_messages: The effects of the incense are fading.

name: Revenant Hunger
desc: Immunity to food poisoning and parasites, increased hunger gain.  Does not purge pre-existing conditions.
remove_message: Your craving for rotten food subsides.
decay_messages: Your craving for rotten food is starting to wane.

name: Ward Against Cold
desc: Protection against the effects of cold.
remove_message: For a moment you feel a terrible chill in the air, as the ward against cold fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against cold is waning.

name: Free Action
desc: Protection against paralytic and other hindering effects.
remove_message: You feel the otherworldly tension in your muscles leave your body, as the ward against paralytic effects fades.
decay_messages: Your spell of free action is waning.

name: Ward Against Heat
desc: Protection against most effects of heat.
remove_message: You feel a strange tingling sensation, as the ward against heat fades.
decay_messages: The ward against heat is waning.

name: Ward Against Flame
desc: Complete immunity to fire, and to related side effects.
remove_message: You feel a strange tingling sensation, as the ward against flame fades.
decay_messages: The ward against flame is waning.

name: Clarity of Blood
desc: Protection against parasitic and corruptive threats, such as the Mycus.
remove_message: The soothing sensation coursing through your veins fades, as the protective magic dissipates.
decay_messages: Your clarity of blood spell is waning.

name: Ward Against Corrosion
desc: Protection against lingering acid effects.  Direct contact will still harm you.
remove_message: You feel a tingling sensation over your skin, as the protective magic fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against corrosion is waning.

name: Ward Against Acid
desc: Complete immunity to acid damage, in addition to its aftereffects.
remove_message: You feel a tingling sensation over your skin, as the protective magic fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against acid is waning.

name: Ward Against Poison
desc: Protection against toxic gas and venom.
remove_message: You feel a momenary weakness as the protective magic fades.

name: Ward Against Evil
desc: Protects against various anomalous effects.
remove_message: The magical protection fades.
decay_messages: Your ward against evil is waning.

name: Holy Ward
desc: Heavy resistance to bladed weapons, protection from anomalous effects.
remove_message: The magical protection enveloping your body flickers and fades.
//: Replace with resistances when implemented, physical immunities are way more OP than elemental immunities.

name: Might
desc: The fabric of The Veil is woven into your frame  Your strength is augmented by magic.
remove_message: You feel weakened as your magically-induced strength leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of might is waning.

name: Agility
desc: The winds of distant realms are at your back.  Your dexterity and speed are augmented by magic.
remove_message: You feel sluggish as your magically-induced agility leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of agility is waning.

name: Insight
desc: The eyes of The Beyond shall guide you.  Your perception is augmented by magic.
remove_message: You feel deadened as your magically-induced perception leaves you.
decay_messages: Your spell of insight is waning.

name: Alchemical Ward
desc: Temporary resistance to the side effects of certain potion effects.
remove_message: The talisman's effect fades.
decay_messages: The water talisman's blessing is waning.

name: Revenant Blood
desc: Immunity to food poisoning, parasites, and fungus.  Increased hunger and thirst gain.
remove_message: The protective effect of your sanguine mark fades, leaving a momentary itch in your veins.
decay_messages: The protective magic flowing through your blood is starting to wane.

name: Suppressed Fire
desc: Reduces hunger and thirst gain, hinders stamina regen.
remove_message: The warmth within your body flares up as the suppression effect fades.
decay_messages: The magic suppressing your inner fire is waning.

name: Illusion Cloak
desc: Light seems to warp around you in an unnatural manner, rendering you invisible and protecting against various perception-related hazards.
remove_message: The shroud of illusion magic around you fades.
//: Immunity to blindness in general is the only way to make an effect reliably protect against flashbangs, so best justification is to counter things that mess with vision as a whole.  Does NOT protect against Glimpse of The Beyond, just because the host can't see you doesn't mean the archon can't...
decay_messages: The illusions enveloping you are starting to fade.

name: Ward Against Lightning
desc: Complete immunity to lightning.
remove_message: You feel an electric tingle as your protective magic fades.
decay_messages: The ward against lightning is waning.

//: Regular Ward Against Evil will only protect you a bit, you need Holy Ward to actually stop the effect.  This will be relevant once I add an encounter you can access after restoring the ritual blade.
name: Glimpse of The Beyond
desc: You caught the attention of something that doesn't belong in this world...
remove_message: You feel a faint sense of relief wash over you.
miss_messages: Afterimages on the edge of your vision distract you.

name: Otherworldly Weakness
Otherworldly Weakness
Otherworldly Weakness
Otherworldly Sickness
Otherworldly Sickness
Otherworldly Sickness
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
Otherworldly Offering
desc: You've been feeling more weary lately, and it's getting hard to think straight.  Overuse of the chalice seems to have an effect on you.
It's starting to get harder to focus on your surroundings.  Maybe using your own life force to fuel the chalice is a bad idea....
Even when you aren't exhausted, you find it hard to stay awake.  This is going to be the death of you if you keep overusing that damn chalice!
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
You feel an odd sensation in the back of your head, an ethereal ache you can't quite explain.  It's like your very existence is crumbling away.
Your very essence is nothing more than fuel for the pyre...
//: This will EVENTUALLY kill you if you max out the effects, unless you're abusing magical healing.
This won't kill you, but the health and stat penalties will make you wish it did later on down the line.
name: Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
Strange Anemia
desc: your muscles have been feeling more fatigued lately, and you feel faintly queasy on the inside.  Maybe overusing that athame did something to you...
The weakness in your body has worsened, and you've been having hunger pangs.  It seems blood magic has consequences if overused.
Your body feels sluggish and drained, and it seems to be getting worse the more you rely on blood magic.  Relying on it less might help ease your suffering.
It feels like your body is struggling to sustain itself, as your overuse of the athame's magic has taken its toll on you.  It might be a good idea to stop using that damn thing for a while...

//: This marks a player as having been led to The Hermit via a quest chain, no name or description since this one is player-side.  Intended to be permanent.
This marks a player as having asking The Hermit for personal information and failed the roll, no name or description since this one is player-side.  Intended duration 3 hours.
This marks a player as having talked The Hermit into revealing general familiarity with the arcane.  Intended to be permanent.
This marks a player as having talked The Hermit into revealing their affiliation with the Keepers of The Oath, opening up quests.  Intended to be permanent.

name: Quest Stage 1
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's quest progression, changing dialogue.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

//: This marks a player as having talked The Hermit into helping an illiterate character complete the ritual.  Intended to be permanent.

name: Has Sanguine Codex
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's progress through the ritual.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Has Blood Essence
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's progress through the ritual.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Has Salt
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's progress through the ritual.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Quest Stage 2
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's quest progression, changing dialogue.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Quest Stage 3
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's quest progression, changing dialogue.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

name: Quest Stage 4
desc: AI tag marking The Hermit's quest progression, changing dialogue.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

//: Effect for both players and NPCs, to filter out whether the rural church has already spawned vs new players asking about the structure, and used by The Deacon to change dialogue after he's heard back from Sofia.  Intended to be permanent.  No name or description since players will get it too.
Effect for players, filters out dialogue in The Deacon's talk topic, once the player has already been directed to the rural church.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for players, transmits mission info from Sofia to the Deacon.  Intended to be permanent.

Effect for both players and NPCs, for Sofia it filters out sanguinist and Keeper players that have explained their motivation for visiting the holdout.  Also used for Johnathan to filter out some bug-proofing dialogue.
Effect for players, marks certain professions as having explained to the mage hunter guards why their mere presence gives them the heebie-jeebies.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for players, marks them as being trustworthy and known to Sofia's camp.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for both players and NPCs, changes dialogue for both the Evac Merchant and Sofia.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for players, indicates that they asked one of the guards to assist in a hunt.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for players, indicates that they asked another guard to assist in a hunt.  Intended to be permanent.

name: Mission Marker
desc: AI tag marking that Sofia has attracted the first wave of allies to the rural church.  Also used to indicate to Jonathan that their third mission has been completed.  Intended to be permanent.  This is a bug if you have it.

//: Effect for players, indicates that Sofia has already given the player a copy of Apprentice's Notes.  Intended to be permanent.
Effect for players, populates Matthew's initial menu with the trade option.  Intended to be permanant.
